title: Walk through lux e or go around? What's faster?
body: Does anyone know what's more efficient in terms of speed? I'd test it but but I got no friends. If someone wants to help test it, lmk I'll even put you in my book of friends as the first entry.

replies.body: dash through it or abort mission
Meaning don't walk through, around is faster?
meaning don't chase a lux if you don't have a gap closer
Depends on starting angle and if you have to walk through all of it.
